interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Star Trek: The Original Series: The Complete Series
Review Date: 2018/08/17
Store: William Shatner  (Actor),     Leonard Nimoy  (Actor)    Rated:    NR    Format: Blu-ray
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, Blu-ray
Product Description: ['Complete Series']
Average Rating: 4.7
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'Widescreen, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, Subtitled, Box set', 'Contributor': 'William Shatner, James Doohan, Leonard Nimoy', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '20', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 0.01 Ounces', 'Item model number': '35386474', 'Media Format': 'Widescreen, DTS Surround Sound, Dubbed, Subtitled, Box set', 'Release date': 'June 14, 2016', 'Actors': 'William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, James Doohan', 'Dubbed': 'Spanish, French', 'Subtitles': 'French, Spanish, English, Portuguese', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Number of discs': '20'}
Review Text: I love the video quality in this set.  It was re-mastered to HD and offers you the option of the enhanced effects or the original effects.  All are in superb HD quality and stunning to watch.  Rewatching the series from these blu-ray discs is like watching it over again from the start.  There are so many details you wouldn't notice from the old SD version.  I highly recommend these for any Star Trek fan!
Review Title: Awesome Quality
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Ward'], 'Starring': ['Chevy Chase', "Beverly D'Angelo", 'Juliette Lewis'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Like all of the movies in the National Lampoon series, Christmas Vacation is hilarious. Chevy Chase does a great job in this movie. It's a classic for our family to watch every holiday season. If you've never seen this, you are really missing out on one of the funniest and most festive Christmas movies ever produced. One of the best Christmas movies ever Mighty Cruise Ships Documentary ['From a Viking longship to the biggest cruise ship in history, embark on all new adventures in our brand-new season.'] {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Michael Davidson', 'Peter Findlay', 'Mark Stevenson', 'Herrie Tencate', 'Peter Gombos'], 'Producers': ['Smithsonian Channel']} I have really enjoyed the Mighty Cruise Ships series. I love the ocean and ships in general. You get a lot of information from this series about how cruise's operate and how the ships are designed. I have really enjoyed watching the series and seeing the differences in different cruise operators, destinations, and types of passengers that sail on the various vessels. If you are a cruise and/or ship guru, you will appreciate this series. Great information and cruise following Star Trek: Voyager: The Complete Series Kate Mulgrew (Actor), Robert Beltran (Actor) Rated: NR Format: DVD Movies & TV, Paramount Home Entertainment, Boxed Sets {'Genre': 'Science Fiction & Fantasy/Television', 'Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Subtitled, Dolby, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Contributor': 'Kate Mulgrew, McNeill, Ethan Phillips, Robert Beltran, Robert Duncan, Roxann Dawson', 'Language': 'English', 'Number Of Discs': '47', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'NR (Not Rated)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.7 x 7.5 x 5.4 inches; 2.71 Pounds', 'Media Format': 'AC-3, Box set, Subtitled, Dolby, NTSC, Full Screen', 'Release date': 'March 7, 2017', 'Actors': 'Kate Mulgrew, Robert Beltran, Ethan Phillips, Robert Duncan, McNeill', 'Subtitles': 'English', 'Studio': 'PARAMOUNT', 'Number of discs': '47'} I have always been a Star Trek fan. After TNG, I never really got into Deep Space Nine. What I liked about Voyager is the similarity to TNG, with them being on a ship and exploring. I wish they would release this on blu-ray, although it sounds like that probably won't happen. The DVD box set is the next best thing and I am happy to have it and watch the series regularly. profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Content Preference:** The user continues to display a strong affinity for high-definition animated content and imaginative programming, alongside a love for classic series. Their engagement with humorous holiday films and educational documentaries reflects a well-rounded viewing portfolio that melds nostalgia with informative entertainment, with a new emphasis on classic science fiction.

- **Genre Inclination:** The user has a specific fondness for adventure, fantasy, comedy, and action genres, sustaining a particular appreciation for classic comedies and lighthearted narratives during festive occasions. They showcase a growing interest in classic science fiction series which aligns with their enthusiasm for exploration and journey themes, further connecting to their preference for travel documentaries.

- **Quality Appreciation:** Maintaining an average rating of 4.8, the user exhibits a discerning taste for high production quality. Their recent purchase underscores this preference for exceptional video quality and remastered content.

- **Rating Trend:** The user actively seeks captivating and humorous content while expanding their exploration of classic science fiction narratives, reinforcing their established interest in family-friendly themes.

- **Language and Accessibility:** Consistently favoring English-language media, the user utilizes subtitles for enhanced accessibility.

- **Content Advisory Awareness:** They remain attuned to content advisory labels, exemplifying responsible media consumption.

In summary, the user seeks engaging, high-quality content that marries nostalgia and humor with themes of exploration and learning while increasingly delving into classic science fiction series.
